screen_desc: The screenshot shows a "Search your photos" interface on a mobile phone with four categories listed: Videos, Movies, Animations, and Collages. There is also a "Show more" option available.

action_plan: Scroll down to find the category that matches the user's request.
Click on the category to view the photos.

action_result: By clicking on the "Show more" text, you have expanded the list of categories in the "Your photos" section. As a result, you are now able to view the "Creations" section, which includes your saved creations. This action has made progress towards completing the user request, as it allows you to explore and manage your creations within the "Your photos" section.
